Home Answers Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > Technology > Inventions > Name a reason why people might prefer eating at a fast food restaurant? Name a reason why people might prefer eating at a fast food restaurant? In: Inventions , Food&Cooking [ Edit categories ] Answer: Maybe people like it more at a fast food restaurant because they do not have to make the food themselves, and it doesn't take too long to be served to them. Another reason might be because people don't usually have a deep fryer in their house, and they are in the mood for fried food. Did we answer your question?
YES Partially NO

Relevant answers:
Name a reason someine might prefer eating at a fast food restaurant ? People think it's quick, cheap, ready-to-go meal. They simply walk in, pay, and lunch is done. But they don't know how many calories it's got. It's got awful greases and there's horrible truths... Name a reason someone might prefer eating at a fast food resturant? 1. reason is maybe you dont have food at your house 2. you dont have to cook and 3.resteraunts rule!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Good foodFast serviceConvenient What are some reasons that people prefer eating at a fast food restaurant ? FAMILY FEUD ANSWERS!!!! 1. fast service 2.convenience 3.open late 4.good foodThere are many different reasons for the growing popularity of fast food restaurants. As families become busier, fast food... Name a reason someone may prefer eating at a fast food restaurant ? 1. Faster2. Less social3. Tastes better4. Cheaper5. Considered fun6. easier7. Drive-thru8. People become lazier9. Playground10. The atmosphere11. Donations12. Coupons13. Free food14. The Smell15.... Name a reason someone might prefer eating in a fast food restraunt? fast service
